committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to provide for the wilderness designation of certain lands within the Ocala National Forest, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates the following lands in the Ocala National Forest in Florida as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System: (1) the Alexander Springs Wilderness; (2) the Juniper Prairie Wilderness; (3) the Little Lake George Wilderness; and (4) the Billies Bay Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the wilderness designation of certain lands within the Ocala National Forest, and for other purposes.
